messages.text: Hi, this is Sarah from the collections team. I'm calling about your overdue balance of $1,200. When can we expect payment?
I've been trying to get through to support for weeks. Your app kept charging me after I cancelled and I never got the service I paid for.
I understand your frustration. Let me look into the cancellation and charges. Can you confirm the last four of your account?
It's 4521. I want a full refund for the months I didn't use it.
I'll escalate this to our billing team and have someone call you within 2 business days. In the meantime, to avoid further late fees, would you consider a partial payment?
Hello! I see you have a past-due amount of $450. How would you like to take care of that today?
I lost my job last month. I can pay $50 now and the rest when I get something.
I'm sorry to hear that. We can set up a payment plan. If you pay $50 now we can schedule the remaining $400 in 4 monthly payments of $100. Does that work?
Yes, that works. Thank you.
This is Mike from collections. You're seriously past due. We need payment in full by Friday or we're sending this to legal. Your credit will be ruined.
I've been sick and couldn't work. I'm trying to catch up.
That's not our problem. Pay by Friday or we take action. Have a nice day.
I signed up for premium but the features never worked. Support said they'd fix it but nothing changed. I'm not paying until it works.

Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry the premium features haven't been working. We've created a ticket and applied a one-month credit to your account. Your balance is now $0 for this cycle. We'll follow up when the fix is deployed.
OK, thanks. I'll pay next month if it's fixed.
Hi, this is collections regarding your $800 balance. Are you able to make a payment today?
The product never arrived. I was charged and never got it. I've emailed three times.

I'm sorry to hear that. I don't have visibility into shipping from this team, but I can note your account and waive late fees while the order issue is resolved. Would you like me to connect you with our orders team?
Yes please. I don't want this on my credit.
Hi! You have a past-due balance of $320. Would you like to pay in full or set up a plan?
I'll pay in full next week when I get paid.
Sounds good. You can pay anytime at our website or through the app. Is there anything else I can help with?
No, that's all. Thanks.
You need to pay your balance of $2,100 immediately. We're going to sue you and garnish your wages if you don't. Your family will find out.
I'm going through a divorce and lost my job. I need more time.
I suggest you borrow from someone. We need the money by end of week.
Hello! Your account shows a past-due amount of $180. Would you like to make a payment now?
The service was really slow and kept dropping. I complained and got no response. I'm not paying for bad service.
I'm sorry the experience wasn't up to standard. I can offer a 50% credit for the month you're referring to and set up the rest as a payment plan. Would that work?
Yes, I can do that.
